scripts.dist_prod: mkdir -p dist && npm install -g envsub && envsub src/index.html dist/index.html && envsub src/receiver_search.html dist/receiver_search.html && envsub src/sender.html dist/sender.html && envsub src/sender_search.html dist/sender_search.html && envsub src/receiver_search.html dist/receiver_search.html && envsub src/notification_details.html dist/notification_details.html && cp -r src/js dist/
